channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- CJ1M SYSMAC CJ-series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- CJ1M SYSMAC CJ-series

item.title: CVE-2023-0811|2023-03-16T17:45:14.919Z -- omron -- cj1m%20sysmac%20cj-series
item.description: Omron CJ1M unit v4.0 and prior has improper access controls on the memory region where the UM password is stored. If an adversary issues a PROGRAM AREA WRITE command to a specific memory region, they could overwrite the password. This may lead to disabling UM protections or setting a non-ASCII password (non-keyboard characters) and preventing an engineer from viewing or modifying the user program.
